title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: As soon as one challenge is mastered, you set out in search of the next. Your sincere and instinctual commitment to self-development does not let much dust settle on your ambitions. But it is important to occasionally take a break and remember that you are worthy of unconditional love, human flaws and all. Keep the door open to the free flow of compassion in your relationships with others and, perhaps most importantly, in your relationship with yourself. In a world where you can be anything, be kind. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
